text: “Kodi iwo alinayo milungu imene idawakhazikitsira m’zipembedzo zimene Allah sadaziloleze? Ndipo pakadapanda kutsogola (lonjezo lochedwetsa) liwu la chiweruziro (mpaka pa tsiku la Qiyâma); pakadaweruzidwa pakati pawo (okanira ndi okhulupirira pompano pa dziko lapansi). Ndipo ndithu opondereza chawo nchilango chowawa
